import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./ProductList.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductList=()=>{const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchProducts();},[]);const fetchProducts=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/products');const data=await response.json();setProducts(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching products:',error);}};// Helper function to format product names into a file path
